gov.anl.ipns.Util.File
Class SerializeUtil

java.lang.Object
  gov.anl.ipns.Util.File.SerializeUtil

public class SerializeUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for reading and writing generic Objects from and to a File.

readObjectFromFile

public static java.lang.Object readObjectFromFile(java.io.File file)
Reads an Object from a file. It automatically closes the InputStream and handles Exceptions.

Parameters:
file - The file to read from.
Returns:
The Object read if successful, null otherwise.

readObjectFromFile

public static java.lang.Object readObjectFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
Reads an Object from a file. It automatically closes the InputStream and handles Exceptions.

Parameters:
fileName - The name of the file to read from.
Returns:
The Object read if successful, null otherwise.

writeObjectToFile

public static boolean writeObjectToFile(java.lang.Object obj,
                                        java.io.File file)
Writes an Object to a file. This will overwrite anything currently in the File. It also automatically closes the OutputStream and handles Exceptions.

Parameters:
obj - The Object to write to a file.
file - The file to write to.
Returns:
true if the write succeeded, false otherwise.

writeObjectToFile

public static boolean writeObjectToFile(java.lang.Object obj,
                                        java.lang.String fileName)
Writes an Object to a file. This will overwrite anything currently in the File. It also automatically closes the OutputStream and handles Exceptions.

Parameters:
obj - The Object to write to a file.
fileName - The file name to write to.
Returns:
true if the write succeeded, false otherwise.
